short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your Redmine efficiency with a smoother image experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of downloading images on Redmine? This extension simplifies your workflow!

View Images Directly: See all images embedded on the page, eliminating the need to download them manually.
Seamless Image Insertion: Insert images effortlessly into Redmine descriptions with simple copy-paste, no need to upload images to Redmine anymore.

Boost your Redmine efficiency with a smoother image experience!
